description: Fluffy peanut butter pancakes are layered with sweet and juicy strawberry chia jam to make this scrumptious and satisfying stack of vegan pb&j pancakes.
name: Vegan PB&J Pancakes
recipeIngredient: 16 ounces fresh strawberries, (cleaned, hulled and quartered)
2 tablespoons coconut sugar, (or another vegan granulated sugar)
1 cup unflavored soy or almond milk

recipeInstructions.text: Place the strawberries, maple syrup, and vanilla into a small saucepan and place over medium heat. Bring to a simmer and allow to cook until the berries soften, about 10 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Roughly mash about half of the berries with a fork and stir in the chia seeds. Allow to continue simmering for 10 minutes more, stirring occasionally.
Remove from heat and allow to sit for a few minutes. The jam will continue to thicken as it sits.
